attributes.action: Make Fireworks Silent or Low Noise
attributes.additional_details: They’re dangerous and risk harm to those using them & others, they can be highly distressing to many people and animals. The loud bang can cause severe upset in those individuals suffering from PTSD, especially when they associate the bang with gunfire. In relation to pets, it can cause emotional distress that makes it impossible for them to settle. I also know of peoples dogs whom have passed away from a heart attack because of fireworks. Not to mention, they also cause a lot of air pollution.
attributes.background: Use of loud noise fireworks to be made illegal. If not possible, only allow loud fireworks at public displays in an approved venue or to be used on bonfire night and New Year’s Eve only.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758
